content: the highland twist headband is a free crochet pattern on the blog this modern and trendy twist headband is made from two rectangles that are folded and sewn together to create a unique and modern twist works up so quickly in super bulky yarn - 30 minutes or less perfect for quick gifts or craft fairs this warm and cozy headband also looks great in two colors which gives it a color block look would look great in school/team colors as well using a simple variation of the half_double_crochet stitch creates interesting gentle texture link to purchase ad-free pdf for a small fee https //nanascraftyhome com/product/highland-twist-crochet-headband-ad-free-pdf/
